title: Active cutting edges in vitrified CBN grinding wheels.
abstract: NoWheel structure has a critical influence on grinding performance especially active cutting edge density. Experiments were carried out to find out the relationshipbetween active and staticcutting edge density. It was found that there are many more active cutting edges in grinding than expected based on chip thickness formulae mainly due to wheel deflection in grinding

No</dc:description><dc:description>
Wheel structure has a critical influence on grinding performance especially active cutting edge density. Experiments were carried out to find out the relationshipbetween active and staticcutting edge density. It was found that there are many more active cutting edges in grinding than expected based on chip thickness formulae mainly due to wheel deflection in grinding.</dc:description><dc:date>
